title: Uma Musume: Pretty Derby (TV) (Umamusume: Pretty Derby)
synopsis: Famous racehorses that have left behind worthy legacies, unique as they can be, are reincarnated as horse girls in a parallel world. In this life, they start their journey anew as they continue to race and perhaps relive the success they once lived through.
